newsitem.title: UK: BFI unchanged, market lacks direction.
newsitem.headline: BFI unchanged, market lacks direction.

text.p: The Baltic Freight Index was unchanged on Friday at 1,291 points and brokers described the market as aimless and lacking in direction.

It was reported that grain charterers were active in both Panamax and Handy-sizes from Argentina and Brazil but despite the volume of fixing, rates showed little sign of improving for owners. On the contrary, Panamax rates to the Far East have eased to some extent.
At 1200 GMT BIFFEX was 10 to five points down and turnover was 11 lots.
